cast.name: 弗拉迪米尔·斯库尔蒂 Vladimír Škultéty
彼得·帕夫利斯 Petr Pavlisovi

this_title: Did Michael Knight End the Cold War?
trans_title: 骑士迈克尔终止了冷战么？
introduction: Czechoslovakia, 1989: for 9-year-old Jachim, there is nothing greater than the TV series "Knight Rider", which he can receive clandestinely on an Austrian signal. Together with his little brother, he re-enacts the most daring stunts from the series and wreaks a lot of havoc in their high-rise neighborhood. Surprisingly, Jachym's father has little understanding for his passion for Michael Knight. But when the demonstrations begin in the fall of 1989, Jachym and Michael Knight hatch a plan to prove themselves to everyone.
chinese_title: 骑士迈克尔终止了冷战么？
foreign_title: Did Michael Knight End the Cold War?
